title: Simple Life - Bukit Bintang
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Malaysian
description: Offers healthier vegetarian food made with natural ingredients. Low salt, sugar, and oil. Many outlets. Go to Hennis or Zara to the 2nd floor, get out to the shopping center and you're in.
streetAddress: 2F, Lot 10 Shopping Centre, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang
